additional_attributes.description: Use this to describe the state of an item.
For refurbished items, this is the original/new equivalent product identifier ID which is different from the restored product identifier ID.
To be used for refurbished items: This refers to the original/new equivalent product identifier.
Specify one Original/New Equivalent Product ID and its ID Type. Required if Condition = Restored.

summary: The page outlines mandatory attributes for Swimsuit Cover-Ups, including 'Condition', 'Original Product ID', 'Original Product ID Type', and 'Original/New Equivalent Product Identifier', emphasizing the necessity of compliance to avoid validation failures.
